levelledPara.title: Overall Configuration and Function
levelledPara.para: Purpose and operating context: Provide a comprehensive description of the system or component purpose, its role within the aircraft, and how it operates. Include major functions and operational scenarios.
Major interfaces: Describe key interfaces with other systems, structures, or components. Include mechanical, electrical, hydraulic, or data interfaces as applicable.

levelledPara.title: Load Paths and Structural Philosophy
levelledPara.para: Primary load paths: Describe how loads are transmitted through the structure. Include bending, shear, torsion, and compression/tension considerations.
Design philosophy: Explain the structural design approach including fail-safe features, redundancy, damage tolerance, and maintenance accessibility.

levelledPara.title: Materials
levelledPara.para: Material specifications: List primary materials used and their specifications. Include rationale for material selection based on strength, weight, corrosion resistance, and other factors.

levelledPara.title: Section Breakdown and Stations
levelledPara.para: Zones and stationing: Identify major sections, zones, or regions. Provide station numbers, frame locations, or other positional references using the aircraft coordinate system.

levelledPara.title: Interfaces
levelledPara.para: Upstream/downstream interfaces: Enumerate connections to adjacent structures, systems routing, attachment points, and access provisions.
